context.title: Save, Set & Restore Browser
context.description: Save and Restore browser provides facilities to browse the contents of the save and restore storage and select and request a display of beamline sets and snapshots.

context.title: Snapshot Viewer
context.description: Snapshot Viewer displays the contents of a Save, Set and Restore snapshot and allows to take and store new snapshots, restore the values from an existing snapshot, export data to files etc.

context.title: Beamline Set Editor
context.description: Beamline Set Editor provides means for displaying and editing the contents of a beamline set. It allows user to edit an existing beamline set or to create a new one either from an existing one or from scratch.
